TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TextChange extends System.Object

summary.span: 包含有关在 事件中发生的更改的信息。

span.span: Contains information about the changes that occur in the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个对象指定在发生更改或。A object specifies where a change occurred in a or . 属性指定的更改的位置属性指定已添加多少个符号，和属性指定多少个符号已删除。The property specifies the position of the change, the property specifies how many symbols were added, and the property specifies how many symbols were removed. 当更改发生在，符号是单个字符。When the change occurs in a , a symbol is a single character. 在发生更改时，符号是以下之一：When a change occurs in a , a symbol is one of the following: - 开始或结束标记元素。An opening or closing tag for a element. - 一个元素中包含或。A element contained within an or . 请注意，此类始终算做一个符号; 任何其他内容或包含的元素不计为符号。Note that such a is always counted as exactly one symbol; any additional content or elements contained by the are not counted as symbols. - 每个 16 位[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_unicode](~/includes/tlasharptla-unicode-md.md)]内部文本字符元素。Each 16-bit [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_unicode](~/includes/tlasharptla-unicode-md.md)] character inside of a text element. 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

summary.span: 获取或设置已添加到控件的符号数。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of symbols that have been added to the control.

value.span: 已添加到控件的符号数。

span.span: The number of symbols that have been added to the control.

The position at which the change occurred.
